DOC.brief_summary: A training module develop parent effectively address stressor demand parent promote positive supportive parent-child interaction . The purpose study implement parent train program evaluate effectiveness program . Depending result , investigator expect core aspect module adaptable modify extended parent older child future meet need family across stage childhood development .
DOC.detailed_description: Parents child enrol Head Start program recruit take part training module learn practice mindfulness technique . Recruited participant randomly assign intervention group wait-list control group . Parents intervention group attend training , involve 6 weekly , group session . Data collect intervention wait-list control group 1-3 week prior intervention period 1-3 week follow end intervention period . This data collect self-report questionnaire , in-home observation , hair sample parent , activity tracker parent , record developmental assessment attendance target child Head Start . The wait-list control group offer training measure complete . Intervention group participant may invite take part focus group train complete . At focus group , engage discussion experience opinion class . Some participant may invite individual interview share experience aid revision program .
DOC.criteria: Parents child age 0 5 enrol Head Start
